last_episode_to_air.name: Case Closed
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rebecca has a chance at breaking a courtroom record, but drama with Michelle's ex-husband threatens to slow the process. At the same time, Tom tries desperately to form official friendships with the gang. Meanwhile, Tedward and Gary search for the perfect gift for Rebecca.

name: Bad Judge
overview: The series chronicles the personal life (and the wild lifestyle) of Rebecca Wright, a tough-as-nails judge serving on the Los Angeles County Circuit Court, whose time off the bench is spent partying and displaying a reckless behavior. Her reputation is about to be tamed—and judged—by Robby Shoemaker, a eight-year-old boy whose parents Rebecca put behind bars. He might be the one that can turn Rebecca's life around.
tagline: Upholding the rules by day. Breaking them by night.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Rebecca Wright, a respected and rough criminal court judge, leads a very different life than expected.

episodes.name: Meteor Shower
episodes.overview: Rebecca tries to clear her head with some alone time after realising she's not ready to move forward from Gary. A mishap with her vehicle makes her realise the importance of her relationship with Tedward.

episodes.name: One Brave Waitress
episodes.overview: Rebecca attempt to become friends with the court stenographer after she forgets her name and also looks for a way to get retribution after failing to find justice in the courtroom.

episodes.name: Knife to a Gunfight
episodes.overview: Rebecca considers getting a gun when a convinct she sent to prison is released. Tedward fears for her safety. Tom wants Rebecca to go light on a mentally ill criminal.

episodes.name: Judge and Jury
episodes.overview: Rebecca serves on the jury of a prostitution case. Tedward trains Gary to be Rebecca's potential replacement for the Serpico Olympics.

episodes.name: What Is Best in Life?
episodes.overview: Rebecca does not show her support for Tedward, this causes him to come to the realization about their friendship. Rebecca runs into her archnemsis at the courthouse.

episodes.name: Communication Breakdown
episodes.overview: Rebecca helps a friend through a divorce. Gary is planning a themed romantic evening.

episodes.name: The Cat's Out of the Bag
episodes.overview: Rebecca's ex-husband is in town and he lets her know about the death of a friend.

episodes.name: Face Mask Mom
episodes.overview: It is Christmas and Rebecca tries the case of "Face Mask Mom," featuring a mother who tackled a PeeWee football player.

episodes.name: The Fixer
episodes.overview: Rebecca tries to help her friend Michelle get over her divorce.

episodes.name: Naked and Afraid
episodes.overview: In the midst of a high profile case, a hacker releases an incriminating photo of Rebecca. Meanwhile, Gary is solicited for therapeutic advice.

episodes.name: Lock Down
episodes.overview: Everyone is on lockdown in the courthouse due to a police emergency outside. An innocent game to pass the time leads to a major revelation about Rebecca - she hasn't cried in over 10 years. Meanwhile, Tedward is extremely hungry and discovers someone has stolen granola bars from his earthquake kit.

episodes.name: Case Closed
episodes.overview: Rebecca has a chance at breaking a courtroom record, but drama with Michelle's ex-husband threatens to slow the process. At the same time, Tom tries desperately to form official friendships with the gang. Meanwhile, Tedward and Gary search for the perfect gift for Rebecca.
